original_text: The Lord says, ‘I will choose some of them to be priests. And I will choose some of them to serve me as Levites.’ The Lord says, ‘I will choose some of them to be priests. And I will choose some of them to serve me as Levites.’ The Lord says, ‘I will choose some of them to be priests. And I will choose some of them to serve me as Levites.’
korean_text: 나는 그 가운데에서 택하여 제사장과 레위인을 삼으리라 여호와의 말이니라

sentences.original_text: I will choose some of them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들 중에서 몇 사람을 택하리라

sentences.original_text: And I will choose some of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그들 중에서 몇 사람을 택하리라
